name: Mortimer
descriptions: Mortimer is a high-ranking cannibalistic member of the White Glove Society who works as the maître d' and Marjorie's assistant and right-hand man at the Ultra-Luxe Casino in 2281.

Unlike the other reformed members of the group, Mortimer considers the present direction of the White Glove Society as misled. He views the Society as an elitist institution; denying themselves access to such exotic meat has taken away the only reason for the group to exist. He does not openly share this view, however, and Mortimer keeps his secret plans to return the society to cannibalism intact by any means necessary, whether it be hiring an assassin to silence anyone who gets in his way, or having his White Glove supporters kidnap patrons in the hotel that fit the bill for his motives. Behind closed doors, the society essentially has split into two camps that disagree over the issue.

Once Mortimer obtains a suitable individual for his head chef Philippe to cook and prepare, he plans to hold a special banquet for the members of the society in their private dining hall within The Gourmand to bring them back to their roots. Before this, he will deliver a speech, in which he reveals his true nature to the dinner guests.

To achieve this, Mortimer and his men had intended to capture Carlyle St. Clair III to butcher and dine on. St. Clair was an ideal candidate because, being from a wealthy family, was healthy and well-fed. However, Mortimer mistakenly kidnapped a different boy, Ted Gunderson, who is problematic for him because his father, a rancher named Heck Gunderson who had came to conduct a business deal with the White Glove Society, is willing to do anything to ensure the safety of his son.

Beyond the Beef - Mortimer wishes to revert the White Glove Society to its former cannibalistic ways and hopes to convince them by feeding them human flesh during an upcoming banquet. If a Speech check (62) is passed, Mortimer will try to recruit the player character to help achieve his goals, which involves Ted Gunderson. If one's Speech is too low, it is possible to try to pass a check for evil Karma and non-neutral Strip reputation.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: You double-crossing snake! I have nothing to say to someone so lowly and ill-mannered.

topics.topic_text: I want to join the White Glove Society. I was told I'd need a sponsor.
topics.response_text: Mmm. You'll have to look elsewhere, I'm afraid. The whole idea of "joining" the White Glove Society is pure hogwash.{disdainful}

topics.topic_text: Caesar wishes to extend your society an offer of alliance with his Legion.
topics.response_text: Looking to elevate his social status, is he?

topics.topic_text: Marjorie said you gave a free room to a private investigator.
topics.response_text: Private investigator... Ah, yes. I remember the gentleman.{thinking}

topics.topic_text: Actually, I just need to speak with him.
topics.response_text: Of course, of course.

topics.topic_text: <Lie> Yes, I have some critical information for him.
topics.response_text: Good. I hope that young man gets some closure after all he's been through.

topics.topic_text: I'm on an investigation, too. I'm hoping we can help each other.
topics.response_text: You are? Nothing so grim as his investigation, I hope.

topics.topic_text: <Loudly> Bad news, Mortimer. No one's eating the boy you kidnapped tonight.
topics.response_text: Kidnapped? That's ridiculous! And who said anything about eating anyone?

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for the Gourmand. Am I in the right place?
topics.response_text: Get them!

topics.topic_text: Sorry, Mortimer. Secret recipe. It isn't human, though, I can tell you that.
topics.response_text: No! These are lies! I never kidnapped anyone. And even if I did, there's no harm done. He's alive, after all.

topics.topic_text: [Attack] You all heard his confession! The punishment for cannibalism is death!
topics.response_text: So be it. But we are all cannibals here. My death will be a constant reminder, and some day you will all remember.

topics.topic_text: Too late, Mortimer. You already said too much.
topics.response_text: You're all hypocrites! How can you claim to be connoisseurs yet deny yourselves the greatest of all meats?

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about your organization?
topics.response_text: My, such a popular question. I suppose it is only natural to see us and wonder what it is that makes us special.

topics.topic_text: Where did you say the investigator's room was, again?
topics.response_text: If you head back to the hotel rooms, his will be one floor directly above you after you exit the lobby.

topics.topic_text: I've heard your group dines on human flesh.
topics.response_text: Ah, yes, I've heard that one too. Jealous people say such nasty things. I feel sorry for them.

topics.topic_text: I, too, know what it is to feel the Craving. How can I support your cause?
topics.response_text: Good. Then you know what it is to be discreet in matters of... nutrition. Perhaps you can help me.

topics.topic_text: <Lie> I, too, know what it is to feel the Craving. How can I support your cause?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Good. Then you know what it is to be discreet in matters of... nutrition. Perhaps you can help me.

topics.topic_text: <Lie> I sort of tasted human flesh once. Mmm mmm good. Tell me all your secrets.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Please, you're embarrassing yourself. I must request that you change the subject.

topics.topic_text: So it isn't true?
topics.response_text: I can assure you that the only thing the White Glove Society is guilty of is preparing the tastiest cuisine you'll ever sample.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Indeed. Let's.

topics.topic_text: Do you have any work that needs to be done?
topics.response_text: No, not from the likes of you, I'm afraid. I don't think you'd have the stomach for it. Better look elsewhere.

topics.topic_text: The main course is a person?
topics.response_text: Yes. The wrong person. We scouted the right one for weeks. The heir to a mercantile empire. Sort of a black sheep.{emph. "wrong"}

topics.topic_text: [Attack] He's the least of your problems right now, cannibal.
topics.response_text: You barbarous cur.{pouty}

topics.topic_text: I think you have the wrong person for this job.
topics.response_text: Perhaps I do. Forget I mentioned it.

topics.topic_text: What did you do?
topics.response_text: I asked for a last-minute replacement. And they stole the son of the most dangerous Brahmin baron in New Vegas while he stayed at this very hotel.{increasingly angry at his lackeys' stupidity}

topics.topic_text: Tell me what I need to do.
topics.response_text: I need a replacement, and I need the boy taken care of. The replacement must be healthy and well-bred. One can't very well make steak from gristle.

topics.topic_text: What about the boy you kidnapped?
topics.response_text: Ted Gunderson is his name. It would be simplest if you could convince him this was all an unfortunate misunderstanding.

topics.topic_text: I'll do it.
topics.response_text: Splendid, splendid. The boy is being held in the kitchen beneath the Gourmand. Here are some keys that will allow you access to him.

topics.topic_text: I'll think about it.
topics.response_text: Very well, but I'll need to know soon or I'll be forced to make other plans.

topics.topic_text: <Hushed> Would my companion here make a suitable replacement meal?
topics.response_text: Which one?

topics.topic_text: I framed Heck Gunderson and sent a Securitron to arrest him.
topics.response_text: So the baron has slaughtered his last Brahmin. How delightful. He was a pox on our business.

topics.topic_text: Did you succeed in turning the White Glove Society back to cannibalism?
topics.response_text: We'll know after tonight's banquet at 7 o'clock. I'll only be telling everyone what they've eaten after they've eaten it.

topics.topic_text: Not yet.
topics.response_text: I see. Keep me in the know.

topics.topic_text: I convinced Ted it was all a terrible misunderstanding.
topics.response_text: Good. Having his father's attention cast upon me was the last thing I needed.

topics.topic_text: Ted Gunderson is dead. He wouldn't listen to reason.
topics.response_text: I see. Well this could get out of hand very quickly unless something is done to keep the elder Gunderson in check.{starting to sweat a bit, trying to keep composure}

topics.topic_text: Couldn't Heck just claim intruders killed his son?
topics.response_text: No. Everyone he meets, he tells the same story. That his son disappeared from the casino, not from his room. He'll look guilty.

topics.topic_text: I planted evidence in Heck Gunderson's room.
topics.response_text: You made it past his guards, then? Excellent. Send a Securitron up to his room. It's programmed to investigate anything suspicious.

topics.topic_text: <Lie> I'll do it. Where can I find Ted Gunderson?
topics.response_text: Splendid, splendid. The boy is being held in the kitchen beneath the Gourmand. Here are some keys that will allow you access to him.

topics.topic_text: Wouldn't putting St. Clair's body into a dumpster give it a terrible taste?
topics.response_text: Not this one. Empty. I don't believe it's seen use since before the war.

topics.topic_text: I trapped Carlyle St. Clair in the dumpster outside his house.
topics.response_text: Just as I asked. What a magnificent relief! By now, barring any more bungling, my underlings should have him on his way here.

topics.topic_text: I sent Carlyle St. Clair to come and speak with you.
topics.response_text: Of his own volition? My goodness, you are very professional, aren't you? Well, he's sure to be a hit at our next banquet.

topics.topic_text: Carlyle St. Clair is dead.
topics.response_text: Drat! He was our best chance at a fresh and healthy entree.

topics.topic_text: I left one of my companions in the freezer for your enjoyment.
topics.response_text: Wonderful. You have come through with flying colors. On behalf of my colleagues, allow me to extend my thanks.

topics.topic_text: Will the White Glove Society ally with Caesar now?
topics.response_text: I should think so, but it would be up to Marjorie.

topics.topic_text: What's next, now that the White Glove Society has tasted human flesh again?
topics.response_text: Now that it's been accepted, it will become a regular course for us.

topics.topic_text: Will you serve human flesh at the Gourmand?
topics.response_text: Oh, I very much doubt that. What fun would it be if everyone could have it?

conversation.response_text: I know I'm not the scheduled speaker, but I have a few words, if I may.
